Name: Trigger Table
About the game: You are sitting with at least one and up to seven computer opponents in a cozy place at one table. In the center of the table is a self loading gun operated by two little helpers doing the hard work for you. This is where the fun starts, you have the choice of either pulling the trigger or drawing an action card. The trigger pull is obvious but the action card might result in you being very lucky or being worse off than just pulling the trigger. Try your luck!
